channel.title: file-management on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in file-management on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Design file-sharing system - Part 2: Permission & Password
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In this section, I will discuss how I handle the logic and design the data model for the following features: setting permissions, sharing files for public access, and setting a password for a file.

item.title: Design file-sharing system - Part 1: Directory Structure
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This system aims to provide users with the ability to store, access, and share files directly on our website, similar to Google Drive.
